on the road ...

on the road ... is a collection of travel experiences and insights. Swimming in the Pacific Ocean, biking on the dutch seaside, hiking on the coastline of Ibiza, getting a taste of Sauna in Finland, getting better at coding in Prague and exploring art galleries in London.

  • The Pacific Ocean

    Okinawa is a prefecture in Japan, located in the southernmost part of the country. Acient spirits, blue ocean and a tropical landscape await you.

    Watch now

  • Biking

    Biking on the dutch seaside is a great way to relax and enjoy the fresh sea air. Take an e-bike for the strong winds.

    Watch now

  • Hiking

    Hiking on the coastline of Ibiza is a great way to see the beautiful landscape and take a swim in the blue sea.

    Watch now

  • Sauna

    What Finnish word do you know? Of Course "Sauna"!

    Watch now

  • Coding

    It’s not a bug - it’s an undocumented feature. EuroPython in Prague.

    Watch now

  • Artsy

    Art gallery hopping in London. From the upscale galleries in Mayfair to the street art in Shoreditch.

    Watch now
